name: FPrimaryAssetRules
doc: Structure defining rules for what to do with assets, this is defined per type and can be overridden per asset

Priority: Primary Assets with a higher priority will take precedence over lower priorities when assigning management for referenced assets. If priorities match, both will manage the same Secondary Asset.
ChunkId: Assets will be put into this Chunk ID specifically, if set to something other than -1. The default Chunk is Chunk 0.
bApplyRecursively: If true, this rule will apply to all referenced Secondary Assets recursively, as long as they are not managed by a higher-priority Primary Asset.
CookRule: Rule describing when this asset should be cooked.
